column2: Show all event based cheat options, These cheats trigger events or simulate events from the game..
Temporarily hide event based cheat options..
Designed for the USA/Continental North American states, Releases the CSA with the states that the game intended it to have, removes slavery from the releasing nation and starts the war.
Designed for any other American slave nation. Releases all slave provinces in the Americas as the CSA except your capital and starts you at war.
Unlocks both great wars and world wars.
Releases the Heaveanly Kingdom and starts the war.
